Installing the Windows executable 

INSTALLATION:
   1. Unzip FISH-1.0-win.zip into "C:\<DESIRED DIRECTORY>".
   2. The executable will be located in 
      "C:\<DESIRED DIRECTORY>\FISH-1.0\fish.exe".   
For Example:
   Unzip to "C:\Program Files"
   From a command line type: "C:\Program Files\FISH-1.0\fish.exe" -h.  
   Don't forget the quotations marks!  This executes fish and shows 
   the command line options.  

REQUIREMENTS:
   1. 32 MB of RAM.
   2. Operating system:  Known to run on Windows XP,ME, and NT.


root 2003-06-27
